message:
Fix critical Unicode normalization bug in phrase matching

The phrase matching was failing silently due to curly quote character
mismatch. Editor uses curly apostrophes (U+2019) while backend returns
straight quotes (U+0027). Regex had corrupted characters (two straight
quotes instead of curly quotes), causing normalization to be a no-op.

Key changes:
- Replace character literals with Unicode escapes in textNormalize.ts
- Add debugLogger infrastructure for structured logging
- Update energy threshold from 40 to 50
- Integrate normalized matching across all phrase lookups
- Add backend prompt rules to avoid highlighting quoted content
- Clean up debug console.logs from VoiceSettings
